dialogue.introduction: Yay~! I arrived-pyon! My name is Uzuki, you can call me U-chan!
dialogue.library_intro: Fourth of the Mutsuki-class destroyers, 'Uzuki'-pyon. From convoy escorting to capture operations, I worked re~ally hard! Near the end I was loaded up with lots of machine-guns to down them all! U-chan won't be sunk by bombers!
dialogue.secretary1: Commander... you're wonderful today... nah just kidding pyo-n!
dialogue.secretary3: ohohoh? Tickling is U-chan's specialty pyon! Commander~, I won't let you run away pyo~n!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Comman~der, play with me~, I'm bored-pyon... puppukupu~!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commande~r, if you're tired let's take a break together! Pyon pyon!
dialogue.wedding: "Co~ma~n~der… what's up~? Your face is all red, yeah? I mean, your face is kinda close, yeah? Eh, wha? Ah, is there something on U-chan's face? No way, tell meeee? What? Whaaa!? Fuwaaa…"
dialogue.show_players_score: A report for the Commander pyon
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Uzuki, sortiei~ng! I'll do my best pyon!
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship daughter is born~... who is it pyon?
dialogue.attack: The true power of the Mutsuki-class~! Yaaa!
dialogue.night_battle: U-chan is ama~zing at night pyon!
dialogue.mvp: nnnYay! Great success pyon! This is the real power of the Mutsuki-class! *smug*!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I got beat-pyon... huu..., I want to take a bath-pyon...
dialogue.sunk: This is farewell... for U-chan pyon? Commander... don't cry, okay?
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: A–dmiral! Here's some chocolate from me, pyon! Ah–, I'm not kidding this time, pyon!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Commander!!! It's a two years anniversaryon. U-chan is happyon! Splash!
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: I'm bad with rainy day! Puppukupu~
dialogue.christmas_2015: U-chan, it's Christmas! *nom* *nom* Hmm! It's tasty-pyon! *nom* *nom* ... *nom* *nom*~
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: End year's spring cleaning? U-chan isn't really good at cleaning. I should just pass it to Yayoi.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Commander, Happy New Year and do take care of me this year too-pyon! I want my New Year's Gift-pyon!
